name: Candy Blast Mania
description:
The ultimate candy-collecting puzzle game! Join over 35,000,000+ other players to help Candy Girl and her dog in their quest to defeat the Evil Gummy Bear King!

We have exciting tournaments and challenges you won't find in ANY other puzzle game! There's endless fun to be had on this delightfully delectable puzzle adventure!

Want more than just levels? Play our unique events with friends to see who's the best candy collector in the Kingdom!

Unique challenge modes you'll find ONLY in Candy Blast Mania:
・High Score Event: Earn as many points as you can and climb the event leaderboard to become the true Candy champion!
・Team vs Team & Community Events: Team up with players from around the world to collect colorful candy and win together!
・Tournaments: Compete with other players to get the highest score and place on the global leaderboard for amazing prizes!

Relax with endless matching fun – there are NEW levels every week!

Candy Blast Mania features:
・Strategic gameplay with a twist: Create explosive on-board combo spots and huge multiplier bonuses to take down the Evil Gummy Bear
・Easy to learn, but challenging to master
・Compete against Facebook friends for delicious prizes
・Relax with endless matching fun – there are NEW levels every week!

Candy Blast Mania is free to play, but you may purchase in-app items with real money. You can disable the payment feature by restricting in-app purchases in your device's settings under "Allowed Content". In addition, Candy Blast Mania may link to social media services such as Facebook. Storm8 Studios will have access to your information through such services.

Want to know what we're up to next? Follow us:

facebook.com/storm8

Have fun playing Candy Blast Mania! We'll see you soon in the Candy Kingdom!
